description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Torturer.

name: torturer.special
description: Torture 100 players. Be convinced they deserved it.

name: victory.guardian
description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Guardian.

name: guardian.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Guardian.

name: guardian.gaining.wartrained
description: As the Guardian, become wartrained by the Tactician.

name: victory.shaman
description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Shaman.

name: shaman.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Shaman.

name: shaman.special
description: Protect 300 players with Ancestral Winds.

name: victory.warden
description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Warden.

name: warden.wins.ten
displayName: No holds barred, no bars held
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Warden.

name: warden.special
description: During a full game, only put chaos roles in jail.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Witch of Light.

displayName: A shimmer at the end of the tunnel

name: witchoflight.special
description: Trigger the bard song ten times.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Knight.

name: knight.wins.ten

description: As a Knight, somehow kill a Wolf role at night.

description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Maiden.

name: maiden.special
description: As a Maiden, have two other maidens as your neighbors.

name: victory.orphan
description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Orphan.

name: orphan.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Orphan.

name: orphan.special
description: Have a player with no active votes being lynched purely through bonus votes.

displayName: Basket full of hope and dreams

name: executioner.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Executioner.

name: executioner.special

name: inquisitor.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Inquisitor.

name: inquisitor.special
description: As the Inquisitor, eliminate three players tamed by the Draketamer.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Witch of Moon.

name: moonwitch.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Witch of Moon.

name: moonwitch.special
description: Perform a moonstrike on a Concubine while the Concubine is visiting you.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Barbarian.

name: barbarian.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Barbarian

name: barbarian.special
description: As a Barbarian, gain a Town Investigator ability.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Ronin.

name: ronin.wins.ten
description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Ronin.

name: ronin.special

description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Tactician.

name: tactician.special

description: As a Bard, gain a killing ability and slay a player you previously sang about.

description: Win your first multiplayer game as the Purist.

description: Win ten multiplayer games as the Purist.
